attributes.action: Legalise the Usage of Marijuana in a controlled amount
attributes.additional_details: I want Parliament to make this change as i believe the benefits outweigh the downside and can be helpful to stabilise the economy especially during this cost of living crisis Marijuana has been proven to have health benefits if taken in small doses so i believe the use of Marijuana and THC produce should be legalised for the sake of the United Kingdoms people and economy and that it be produced under controlled farmers rather than Drug dealers who waste police time with marijuana related issues
attributes.background: As seen in many states in the United States of America and areas of the Netherlands the usage of marijuana being legalised in small amounts has helped both the economy and the people and crime rate in those areas have dropped significantly and so i believe that this would be beneficial to the UK
